About This App

This project began as part of a Web 425 Angular course, where the goal was to learn Angular fundamentals while implementing asynchronous data handling using the async pipe. The original version featured a basic composer list with a working search bar powered by Angularâ€™s reactive capabilities.

Now updated to the latest version of Angular, this app includes:
  • A wider selection of composers and genres
  • Refined sort and filter functionality
  • An enhanced user interface for a more modern and responsive experience

Whether you're a student, musician, or simply someone who loves to explore classical and contemporary music, this app is designed to help you discover and study with composers from all eras with ease.
